welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lingwala, Congo (Kinshasa)! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's vibrant culture, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lingwala has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at N'dolo Airport serves all domestic and regional flights within the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at N'dolo Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, including imports and exports.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maya Maya Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ndjili International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ndjili International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
